Detailed Description

The SharedMemoryIO class for reading and writing of shared memory regions used with RDB buffers.

SharedMemoryBuffer VTD::SharedMemoryIO::getNextBuffer ( unsigned int  checkMask  ) 

get the next buffer that is not locked and has the given check mask flags set. If more than one buffer is readable, the one with the lower frame number takes precedence.

Parameters:
checkMask the flags that should be set.
Returns:
SharedMemoryBuffer object or 0 if buffer cannot be accessed or is locked.

SharedMemoryBuffer VTD::SharedMemoryIO::tryGetBuffer ( unsigned int  checkMask,
uint16_t  bufferId 
)

get the buffer with the given id that is not locked and has the given check mask flags set.

Parameters:
checkMask the flags that should be set.
id the buffer's unique id
Returns:
SharedMemoryBuffer object containing pointers or 0 if buffer cannot be accessed or is locked.

bool VTD::SharedMemoryIO::tryLockBuffer ( RDB_SHM_BUFFER_INFO_t &  buffer  ) 

Set lock flag only if not locked.

Parameters:
buffer 
Returns:
true if buffer was locked successfully, false if buffer was already locked or an error occurred.
